BluetoothGetDevices.summary:
The getDevices() method of
interface of Web Bluetooth API exposes the
Bluetooth devices this origin is allowed to access. This method does not display any
permission prompts.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method returns a for each
device the origin is currently allowed to access, even the ones that are out of range
or powered off.

BluetoothGetDevices.returns: A {{JSxRef("Promise")}} that resolves with an array of s.
